doc.field: A group of men with Turkish flags on a table and a Turkish flag hanging on the wall in the background. On the day of general elections. 26.2 x 32.2 cm
A group of men with Turkish flags on a table and a Turkish flag hanging on the wall in the background. On the day of general elections. 26.2 x 32.2 cm

Black and white photographic print of a group of men with Turkish flags on a table and a Turkish flag hanging on the wall in the background. Foto Hilal, Bakirkoy, Istanbul. Turkish writing on the back, 15/10/1961 on the day of General elections and signatures. 26.2 x 32.2 cm: 15 October 1961
